item.title: Completely Automatic Unattended Install of Ubuntu
item.description: OBS 1: this works only for ubuntu server edition, not desktop version. tested in ubuntu 16 x64. OBS 2: remember to change some parts to real values, near: # modify to real value !!! OBS 3: my version need some files in .iso file: “10_linux” & “sources.list”. Warn: the default ks.cfg partition settings will erase the entire disk, and use LVM. See also: Boot Partitions, Install Multi-OS easy2boot PREPARE, AS ROOT # sudo -s
